benchmark_details.name: NETPRESS
benchmark_details.overview: NETPRESS is an automated benchmark generation framework for evaluating LLM agents in network applications, facilitating dynamic generation of diverse query sets and ground truths to improve reliability in high-stakes tasks like network operations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable effective evaluation of LLM-based agents in real-world network applications through dynamic queries that simulate complex operational scenarios.

data.source: Dynamic query generation and simulation environments with network emulators.
data.annotation: Automatically generated through system execution and user-defined parameters.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the evaluation of LLM-generated actions against ground truths and safety constraints through network emulation.
methodology.interpretation: Successful resolution of network issues is indicated by the ability to restore connectivity without introducing new risks.
methodology.validation: Evaluations are conducted using network emulators that validate LLM outputs in a realistic simulated environment.
